references.paper_title: NTIRE 2017 challenge on single image super-resolution: Dataset and study
references.reason: This paper introduced a benchmark dataset for single image super-resolution (SR), widely used in the field and referenced extensively in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Photo-realistic single image super-resolution using a generative adversarial network
references.reason: This paper introduced a seminal generative adversarial network (GAN)-based approach to SR, significantly advancing the state-of-the-art and influencing many subsequent works, including the target paper.

references.paper_title: Image super-resolution using very deep residual channel attention networks
references.reason: This paper proposed a deep residual channel attention network (RCAN) architecture that achieved high performance on SR tasks and is directly compared to in the target paper's experiments.
This paper proposed a dynamic super-resolution method (ARM) that addresses the efficiency challenges of SR, a central theme of the target paper, and serves as a direct comparison.

references.paper_title: Classsr: A general framework to accelerate super-resolution networks by data characteristic
references.reason: This paper introduced a class-specific SR method (ClassSR), a relevant approach to the target paper's focus on data imbalance and model optimization, used for direct comparison in the experiments.
